California is actively working to keep mothers and babies alive and healthy before, during, and after childbirth. And the results show. 

From 2006 to 2013, the maternal death rate in California fell 55%.
https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1023878369430003712 QT @NPR California is tackling a shocking statistic: The U.S. has the highest maternal mortality rate in the developed world, and the majority of those deaths are preventable. https://www.npr.org/2018/07/29/632702896/to-keep-women-from-dying-in-childbirth-look-to-california?utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=npr&utm_term=nprnews&utm_content=20180729
